snippet: The Kroger Company, the nation’s largest traditional grocer, said an important sales figure rose during the second quarter as its loyalty program helped attract shoppers.
abstract: Kroger Company, the nation's largest traditional grocer, reports a second quarter net income of $279.1 million, down from $280.8 million in the same period a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The Kroger Company, the nation’s largest traditional grocer, said an important sales figure rose during the second quarter as its loyalty program helped attract shoppers.

headline.seo: Kroger Reports Lower Profits on Rising Tax Rate
headline.main: Kroger Reports Lower Profits as Tax Rate and Costs Rise
headline.print_headline: Kroger Reports Lower Profits As Tax Rate and Costs Rise
